title: Public Appointments Annual Report
description: The Public Appointments Annual Report provides statistics relating to public appointments in Northern Ireland in 2016/17.
datasetNotes: Data can be found by clicking on the link under current publications.  Data tables are available in ODS and XLS.
sizingNotes: Simple table formats however each tab contains a different number of  tables with inconsistencies across the tabs,  table 1.5 and 3.3 contain disability information by numbers and %.  This dataset may be better suited to the labour market family.
notes: 1 spreadsheet with multiple tables per spreadsheet.  1.5 and 3.5 contain disability information.
